channel.title: Web on Sebastián Aedo's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Web on Sebastián Aedo's blog

item.title: I wanted to take more pictures, so I vibecoded a portfolio
item.description:
I’ve had an interest in photography for a long time, I remember being fascinated by it in highschool and since then I still enjoy looking at pictures, reading about photography (suffering from GAS) and most of all, taking pictures.

During all this time, different social networks were born to showcase photography: Flickr, 500px, and in my opinion, the most active one, Instagram – but the latter has lost its main focus, it’s not longer about sharing photos, but rather a lifestyle (real or not). Stories, Reels, people rarely posts nowadays and I believe interactions with posts took a dip.
